channel.description: Recent content in Dreams on FerrisEllis.com

item.title: A Life of Dreams
item.description: Written by Ferris Ellis on December 14th, 2018. All rights reserved. Oceans suspended. Forever in churning motion. Captive to my many moons drifting through space. A luminious army, making light of night. Forever cycling the sky; forever denying yesterday; unlike the lines on my face. But tonight is different. Tonight is a life of dreams. No moons, no tide. Engulfed in tranquil darkness; I watch a miracle of dance; by diamonds of light.
